type.name: Types
type.summary: Defines types that may be used in several contexts, e.g. when declaring Script properties and when specifying the type of a Global Variable.

type.name: Animations
type.summary: Defines types of animations.

type.name: BodyNodes
type.summary: Defines body nodes.

type.name: PotionTypes
type.summary: Defines Potion types.

type.name: ProjectileTypes
type.summary: Defines Projectile types.

type.name: Resistances
type.summary: Defines resistances.

type.name: Skills
type.summary: Defines skills.

type.name: SoundLevels
type.summary: Defines the sound levels in regard to detection.

type.name: WeaponTypes
type.summary: Defines Weapon types.

type.name: WeatherSoundTypes
type.summary: Defines the types of weather sounds.

type.name: Color
type.summary: Represents a color definition.

type.name: Condition
type.summary: Represents a function with parameters, operand, operator used to compare the result of the function with the specified operand and information on which object the function will be run.

type.name: ConditionCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of Conditions.

type.name: Effect
type.summary: Represents a custom effect based on a Magic Effect.

type.name: EffectCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of Effects that can be used to specify effects of items such as Potions or Scrolls.

type.name: Material
type.summary: Represents a material used by a Constructible Object form.

type.name: MaterialCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of Materials.

type.name: ObjectBounds
type.summary: Specifies the dimensions of an object.

type.name: Script
type.summary: Represents a Papyrus script with parameters.

type.name: ScriptCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of Scripts attached to an object.

type.name: WeatherAlphaQuad
type.summary: Represents a set of alpha channel for each of the four parts of the day: sunrise, day, sunset and night.

type.name: WeatherCloudLayer
type.summary: Represents one of the 32 layers of clouds.

type.name: WeatherColorQuad
type.summary: Represents a set of weather colors for each of the four parts of the day: sunrise, day, sunset and night.

type.name: WeatherFresnelQuad
type.summary: Represents a set of weather fresnel power for each of the four parts of the day: sunrise, day, sunset and night.

type.name: WeatherSound
type.summary: Represents a weather sound of certain type.

type.name: WeatherSoundCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of WeatherSounds.

type.name: Form
type.summary: Represents a form the type of which is either unknown, unsupported or unresolved. To convert an unknown form to a specific form use the appropriate extension method. Properties and methods provided by this class are available to all forms.

type.name: FormCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of forms. A collection may contain mixed form types or only forms of a specific type. To filter and convert a mixed collection to a specific form collection use the appropriate extension method.

type.name: Alch
type.summary: Represents a Potion form.

type.name: Ammo
type.summary: Represents an Ammo form.

type.name: Armo
type.summary: Represents an Armor form.

type.name: Cobj
type.summary: Represents a Constructible Object form.

type.name: Coll
type.summary: Represents a Collision Layer form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Ench
type.summary: Represents an Enchantment form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Equp
type.summary: Represents am Equip Type form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Expl
type.summary: Represents an Explosion form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Flst
type.summary: Represents a Form List form.

type.name: Glob
type.summary: Represents a Global Variable form.

type.name: Gmst
type.summary: Represents a Game Setting form.

type.name: Imgs
type.summary: Represents an Image Space form.

type.name: Ipds
type.summary: Represents an Impact Data Set form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Kywd
type.summary: Represents a Keyword form.

type.name: Ligh
type.summary: Represents a Light form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Matt
type.summary: Represents a Material form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Mgef
type.summary: Represents a Magic Effect form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Proj
type.summary: Represents a Projectile form.

type.name: Race
type.summary: Represents a Race form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Rfct
type.summary: Represents a Visual Effect form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Sndr
type.summary: Represents a Sound Reference form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Spel
type.summary: Represents a Spell form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Spgd
type.summary: Represents a Shader Particle Geometry form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Stat
type.summary: Represents a Static form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Txst
type.summary: Represents a Texture Set form. This form is a work in progress.

type.name: Weap
type.summary: Represents a Weapon form.

type.name: Wthr
type.summary: Represents a Weather form.

type.name: Debug
type.summary: Provides methods that may assist during development and troubleshooting.

type.name: Forms
type.summary: Provides methods that can be used to look up and retrieve any available forms.

type.name: Math
type.summary: Provides useful mathematical functions.

type.name: Engine
type.summary: Provides methods that allow new objects be created.

type.name: Functions
type.summary: Provides methods that can be used to create new based on Papyrus functions. Conditions created with these methods can be added to a .
